title: Sports Font
content:
Can anyone please help me figure out the font in this image? I'm pretty sure the 500 has been tampered with. Thank you!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [image.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724083412/http:/typophile.com/files/image_113.jpg) | 85.81 KB |
author: Primehunter

comments.content: It could be a manually slanted **[ITC Machine (Medium)](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724083412/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=ITC&ffam=ITC%20Machine%20-%20Medium&fid=8d027037e236ab24b235285d2aeb945d&fsize=60&text=INDIANAPOLIS%20500&fit=1)** with a modified "500"
